snippet: Italy played tight defense on Spain and the game ended 1-1, yielding few, if any, clues about whether these two leading soccer nations have another big tournament win in them.
abstract: Rob Hughes On Soccer column asserts that Euro 2012 opener between Spain and Italy yields few, if any, clues about whether the two leading soccer nations have another big tournament win in them.
lead_paragraph: Italy played tight defense on Spain and the game ended 1-1, yielding few, if any, clues about whether these two leading soccer nations have another big tournament win in them.

headline.seo: Euro 2012 — Tie Fails to Settle Anything for Spain and Italy
headline.main: Tie Fails to Settle Anything for Spain and Italy
headline.print_headline: Tie Tells Little About How Far Spain and Italy Can Go
